LanguageData.LLLConsciousnessTooltip: The penalty to consciousness while a pawn is high on smokeleaf (Default: -15%; Vanilla: -30%)
LanguageData.LLLMovementTooltip: The amount of speed that is lost while high (Default & Vanilla: -0.1)
LanguageData.LLLRestTooltip: A penalty that makes a pawn need sleep more often (Default & Vanilla: -0.1)
LanguageData.LLLHungerTooltip: A modifier which makes your pawn hungier more quickly (Default & Vanilla: 0.3)
LanguageData.LLLAddictivenessTooltip: The average chance to become addicted per joint (Default: 1%, Vanilla: 2%)
LanguageData.LLLToleranceTooltip: The amount of built-up tolerance require to become addicted (Default: 50%; Vanilla: 15%)
LanguageData.LLLAsthmaTooltip: The average number of days till a smoker is likely to be affected by Asthma (Default: 360; Vanilla: 180)
LanguageData.LLLCancerTooltip: The average number of days till a smoker is likely to be affected by Carcinoma (Default: 720; Vanilla: 180)
LanguageData.LLLWithdrawalTooltip: The mood penalty when a smoker is suffering withdrawal (Default: -8; Vanilla: -20)
